      • Craft

        public Craft(CraftType type,
             java.util.UUID player,
             org.spongepowered.api.world.Location<org.spongepowered.api.world.World> startLocation)
        Initialises the craft and detects the craft's hitbox.
        Parameters:
        type - The type of craft to detect.
        player - The player that triggered craft detection.
        startLocation - Location from which to start craft detection.

      • removeCrew

        public void removeCrew()
             Clears the crew list of any players it contains.
     Unless the ship is sinking it will be released next time checks are performed.
     Players will be unable to pilot the craft until it is released.

      • burnFuel

        public boolean burnFuel(double movePoints)
        Deducts move points as requested. Used to represent fuel consumption. Will burn fuel from inventories specified in the craft config.
        Parameters:
        movePoints - The number of move points to deduct.
        Returns:
        TRUE if the operation was successful.

      • checkFuelStored

        public int checkFuelStored()
        Calculates the fuel that has not yet been burned.
        Returns:
        The total unburned move points currently aboard the craft.
